attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore should be given a knighthood for raising millions for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: At aged 99 this is no small feat and truly represents the best of British spirit during the coronavirus. His efforts should be recognised by the Queen with a knighthood. The Government should put this request before the Queen so that Captain Tom Moore’s work can be officially recognised.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has raised more than £15 million for the NHS after completing his challenge to walk 100 lengths of his garden.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
